item.description:
Meet other locals from all Industries to discuss your Business Ideas and Strategies. Gather to discuss current events, share experiences, and to network with other people interested in Business. Leverage and learn from each other. No one exists in a vacuum! Come out and share!
Bring plenty of business cards, business and salesperson biography sheets, and any presentation materials to share. Come prepared to give your 30 second pitch, and ask for advice, input and referrals.
YOU MISSED A GREAT EVENT ON 1/21/10! The Rainmakers Group held an open house on 1/21/10 and an informative seminar/workshop was given by photographer, videographer and search engine optimization guru Val Nanovsky of Valdorama.com. Val gave an eloquent talk and invited comments and discussion about the "Social Media Revolution" going on today through Twitter, Facebook, MySpace and LinkedIn as the major players. Thanks to all of the "Rainmakers" for helping to make our first open house and presentation a success!
item.name: Rainmakers Business Strategy / Networking Meetup Group 06066
